name: Inngenso
0:
”Alexa, set temperature to twenty-two degrees.”
”Alexa, make it warmer in here.”
”Alexa, what's the temperature in my room?”
skdetail:
Smart Home Skill. This skill may share device information with Amazon. Learn more.
Rated: Guidance Suggested. This skill contains: dynamic content.
des:
Monitor and control your heating system.

Experience a new level of simplicity and control with our Smart Thermostat Edition. Increase comfort and save energy and costs at the same time.

Smart thermostats are becoming indispensable devices in every household. With our Wi-Fi products, you can control your heating system and set your temperatures so you always arrive at a warm and comfortable home.
